entry.title: Calling all Devs - you can earn up to $2,500 by participating in this thread-writing contest presented by @fleekxyz ⚡️ Ideas to thread about: - Whit...
entry.summary:
Calling all Devs - you can earn up to $2,500 by participating in this thread-writing contest presented by @fleekxyz ⚡️ Ideas to thread about: - Whitepaper TLDR explainers - Benefits/use cases explainers - Ideas for potential services Learn more here 👇
Fleek ⚡️: ⚡@fleekxyz Thread Contest ⚡ The new @fleek_net decentralized edge whitepaper just dropped, and to celebrate we’re putting up a contest for the best reactions 🎉! 1. Make a Twitter thread about Fleek Network. 2. Compete for $5000 in ETH prizes. Wanna join? Hop in 👇
